name: 15 Years of the Constitution of Ukraine
generalDescription: The commemorative coin is dedicated to the 15th anniversary of adoption of the Fundamental Law of Ukraine by Verkhovna Rada (parliament) of Ukraine. The Law determines the socio-political order and polity of Ukraine, rights, freedoms and duties of its citizens.
averseDescription: On the obverse there are: the Small Coat of Arms of Ukraine and the semicircular inscription НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ БАНК УКРАЇНИ (National Bank of Ukraine) (above); below there are the coin issue year and face value 2011/П`ЯТЬ ГРИВЕНЬ (five hryvnias) with the logo of the National Bank of Ukraine Mint to the right; in the centre there is the National Flag of Ukraine (decoration element - enamel) within a conventionalized viburnum wreath.
reverseDescription: On the reverse there is depicted a book of `ОСНОВНИЙ ЗАКОН УКРАЇНИ` (Fundamental Law of Ukraine) against the background of the Verkhovna Rada building where the Constitution was adopted; in the foreground there is depicted a laurel branch. The coin reverse bears the inscriptions: the semicircular above 15 РОКІВ КОНСТИТУЦІЇ УКРАЇНИ (15 years of the Constitution of Ukraine) and below to the left 28 ЧЕРВНЯ / 1996 РОКУ (28 June / 1996 year).
